languages.text: {n}Маражай бросает на вас загадочный взгляд, на его лице блуждает улыбка.{/n} "Комморра — величайшее творение разумной расы. Неужели ты не хочешь взглянуть на нее как следует? Рассмотреть во всех великолепных ее деталях?"

{n}Marazhai gives you an enigmatic look, a smile slowly creeping across on his face.{/n} "Commorragh is the greatest thing ever created by an intelligent race. Surely you wish to see it as it is meant to be seen, to behold it in all its magnificent detail?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай бросает на вас загадочный взгляд, на его лице блуждает улыбка.{/n} "Комморра — величайшее творение разумной расы. Неужели ты не хочешь взглянуть на нее как следует? Рассмотреть во всех великолепных ее деталях?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives you an enigmatic look, a smile slowly creeping across on his face.{/n} "Commorragh is the greatest thing ever created by an intelligent race. Surely you wish to see it as it is meant to be seen, to behold it in all its magnificent detail?"

{n}Marazhai gives you an enigmatic look, a smile slowly creeping across on his face.{/n} "Commorragh is the greatest thing ever created by an intelligent race. Surely you wish to see it as it is meant to be seen, to behold it in all its magnificent detail?"

{n}Marazhai gives you an enigmatic look, a smile slowly creeping across on his face.{/n} "Commorragh is the greatest thing ever created by an intelligent race. Surely you wish to see it as it is meant to be seen, to behold it in all its magnificent detail?"

{n}Marazhai gives you an enigmatic look, a smile slowly creeping across on his face.{/n} "Commorragh is the greatest thing ever created by an intelligent race. Surely you wish to see it as it is meant to be seen, to behold it in all its magnificent detail?"

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋以沉迷的眼神看了你一眼，笑意慢慢爬上了他的脸庞。{/n}“在一切有智慧的种族之中，科摩罗是有史以来最伟大的造物。你肯定想看看它真正的面貌，欣赏它所有的壮丽细节吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you an enigmatic look, a smile slowly creeping across on his face.{/n} "Commorragh is the greatest thing ever created by an intelligent race. Surely you wish to see it as it is meant to be seen, to behold it in all its magnificent detail?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋以沉迷的眼神看了你一眼，笑意慢慢爬上了他的脸庞。{/n}“在一切有智慧的种族之中，科摩罗是有史以来最伟大的造物。你肯定想看看它真正的面貌，欣赏它所有的壮丽细节吧？”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは掴みどころのない表情をして、ゆっくりと笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「コモラフは、知的生物が作ったものの中で一番偉大なものだ。本来あるべき姿を見たいってことは、素晴らしい細部まですべて見たいってことだな？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you an enigmatic look, a smile slowly creeping across on his face.{/n} "Commorragh is the greatest thing ever created by an intelligent race. Surely you wish to see it as it is meant to be seen, to behold it in all its magnificent detail?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは掴みどころのない表情をして、ゆっくりと笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「コモラフは、知的生物が作ったものの中で一番偉大なものだ。本来あるべき姿を見たいってことは、素晴らしい細部まですべて見たいってことだな？」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te dedica una mirada enigmática, y poco a poco se va dibujando una sonrisa en su rostro.{/n} «Commorragh es la más extraordinaria creación de todas las razas inteligentes. Imagino que querrás verla como ha de ser, contemplándola en toda su magnificencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you an enigmatic look, a smile slowly creeping across on his face.{/n} "Commorragh is the greatest thing ever created by an intelligent race. Surely you wish to see it as it is meant to be seen, to behold it in all its magnificent detail?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te dedica una mirada enigmática, y poco a poco se va dibujando una sonrisa en su rostro.{/n} «Commorragh es la más extraordinaria creación de todas las razas inteligentes. Imagino que querrás verla como ha de ser, contemplándola en toda su magnificencia».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous adresse un regard énigmatique et un sourire se dessine lentement sur son visage.{/n} « Commorragh est la plus belle chose jamais créée par une race intelligente. Vous n'allez tout de même pas passer à côté de cette occasion unique de la voir sous son meilleur jour, dans toute la splendeur de ses détails admirablement travaillés ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you an enigmatic look, a smile slowly creeping across on his face.{/n} "Commorragh is the greatest thing ever created by an intelligent race. Surely you wish to see it as it is meant to be seen, to behold it in all its magnificent detail?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous adresse un regard énigmatique et un sourire se dessine lentement sur son visage.{/n} « Commorragh est la plus belle chose jamais créée par une race intelligente. Vous n'allez tout de même pas passer à côté de cette occasion unique de la voir sous son meilleur jour, dans toute la splendeur de ses détails admirablement travaillés ? »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wirft dir einen mysteriösen Blick zu, wobei sich langsam ein Lächeln auf sein Gesicht stiehlt.{/n} "Commorragh ist das absolut Größte, was je von einer intelligenten Spezies hervorgebracht wurde. Sicher wollt Ihr es so erblicken, wie es erblickt werden sollte, nämlich mit all seinen herrlichen Details?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you an enigmatic look, a smile slowly creeping across on his face.{/n} "Commorragh is the greatest thing ever created by an intelligent race. Surely you wish to see it as it is meant to be seen, to behold it in all its magnificent detail?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai wirft dir einen mysteriösen Blick zu, wobei sich langsam ein Lächeln auf sein Gesicht stiehlt.{/n} "Commorragh ist das absolut Größte, was je von einer intelligenten Spezies hervorgebracht wurde. Sicher wollt Ihr es so erblicken, wie es erblickt werden sollte, nämlich mit all seinen herrlichen Details?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, sana esrarengiz bir bakış atıyor. Yüzünü yavaşça bir gülümseme kaplıyor.{/n} "Commorragh, zeki bir ırk tarafından yaratılan, gelmiş geçmiş en iyi şeydir. Onu görülmeyi hak ettiği gibi görmek, ihtişamında yatan tüm ayrıntıların seyrine dalmak istersin herhâlde?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you an enigmatic look, a smile slowly creeping across on his face.{/n} "Commorragh is the greatest thing ever created by an intelligent race. Surely you wish to see it as it is meant to be seen, to behold it in all its magnificent detail?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, sana esrarengiz bir bakış atıyor. Yüzünü yavaşça bir gülümseme kaplıyor.{/n} "Commorragh, zeki bir ırk tarafından yaratılan, gelmiş geçmiş en iyi şeydir. Onu görülmeyi hak ettiği gibi görmek, ihtişamında yatan tüm ayrıntıların seyrine dalmak istersin herhâlde?"
